content: **yarn requirements ** using a yarn which is approx 50 grams/1 76 ounces = 115 meters /126 yards you ll need 1 skein of color white 3 -6 skeins of color blue **sizes ** baby 1-3 3-6 6-9 9-12 months finished chest 47 cm/18 5 48 5 cm/ 19 51 5 cm/20 53 cm/21 toddler 12-18 18-24 months 2-3 years finished chest 56 5 cm/22 60 5cm/24 63 5cm/25 **size information** the sizes run a little more on the bigger side because each baby is different and i think there is nothing worse than -after all the work is done- having a cardigan which is too small so if you re not sure about the sizing or if you want a perfect fitting cardigan follow the chest measurements to find the right size **errata** **5 decrease 2013** updated and corrected pattern pdf available **24 feb 2014 new toddler sizes available**
